app.title: eXeViewer
app.description: View eXeLearning content packages directly in your browser

welcome.dragDrop: Drag and drop your .zip or .elpx file here
welcome.supportedFormats: Supports websites exported from eXeLearning as .zip or .elpx packages

errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid .zip or .elpx file
errors.emptyZip: The file appears to be empty
errors.noHtmlFiles: No HTML files found in the package
errors.swNotSupported: Service Workers are not supported in this browser
errors.swSecureContext: Service Workers require a secure context (HTTPS or localhost)
errors.swTimeout: Timeout waiting for Service Worker controller
errors.secureContextRequired: This application requires a secure context (HTTPS or localhost). Please access via http://localhost/...
